TopicTitle: The Kerbal version of Rosie the Riveter

Articles.Content:
We have Valentina Kerman now.

We need a Rosie the Riveter poster.

Thee were two, the genuine article by Norman Rockwell, and the "We Can Do It" poster briefly used by Westinghouse. Either could be Kerbalized.

![rosie-the-riveter.jpg?w=640](https://qzprod.files.wordpress.com/2015/04/rosie-the-riveter.jpg?w=640)
Quick question, how did you do that with the kerbal model? Is it some sort of program? I'd just like to know so I can do stuff like this in the future.

> 
> Quick question, how did you do that with the kerbal model? Is it some sort of program? I'd just like to know so I can do stuff like this in the future.

It's just this picture from Squad.

![tumblr_inline_nk3m6w1eBm1rr2wit.jpg](https://38.media.tumblr.com/a3e1996317871e0433cca86fa8deb709/tumblr_inline_nk3m6w1eBm1rr2wit.jpg)

How funny! I actually made a Val-as-Rosie drawing in about ten minutes\* with Sharpies a couple of weeks ago:

\*I'm not a bad artist, though anything I do in ten minutes is distinctly subpar for me. Sorry for the numerous and glaring imperfections on this thing...

![oeTDY0N.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/oeTDY0N.jpg)

It's not tremendously high-quality, though I could clean it up and color it if you'd like... ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

-Upsilon

> 
> Quick question, how did you do that with the kerbal model? Is it some sort of program? I'd just like to know so I can do stuff like this in the future.

I just used the official squad picture and MS Paint.
